## User Verification using the National Identification Number (NIN)

An endpoint to fetch and verify customer details using the National Identification Number (NIN) and Image URL. It is a means of identification that contains robust information about an individual.

## Generates user data from their NIN and image

### Endpoint

POST `{{url}}/nigeria_kyc/lookup_nin_with_face`

### Payload

```json
{
  "nin": "123456789",
  "imageUrl": "https://res.cloudinary.com/dh3i1wodq/image/upload/v1675417496/cbimage_3_drqdoc.jpg"
}
```

200 OK Response

``` json
{
  "success": true,
  "statusCode": 200,
  "message": "National Identification Number details retrieved",
  "response_code": "00",
  "data": {
    "nin_data": {
      "title": "",
      "surname": "JOHN",
      "firstName": "DOE",
      "gender": "m",
      "birthDate": "01-04-2002",
      "birthLga": "",
      "birthState": "",
      "centralID": "",
      "educationalLevel": "",
      "email": null,
      "nin": "12345678911",
      "employmentStatus": "",
      "height": "",
      "maritalStatus": null,
      "photo": ""
    }
  }
}
```
